name: NowNamedNoodle!
description:
Hey! I'm a 17-year-old aspiring game developer who aims to specialise in 3D and programming and this is the first game that I have ever developed. I'm currently a year 12 student that attends a creative arts school in London, safe to say that this is the best industry school in the country! 

As this is only a prototype, you will expect many bugs, but I may come back to this project in the future to make it more enjoyable. 

Huge thanks to my fellow trainees Gjin Lipa and Samiul Miah for the music tracks.

Feel free to leave constructive criticism below.
